mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_NUMBER, R_NUMBER, P_ID, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_GOOD, REVIEW_BAD, REVIEW_DATE, USER_NICKNAME, REVIEW_SERVICE, REVIEW_FACILITY, REVIEW_CLEAN, REVIEW_COST, REVIEW_LOCATION ) VALUES( SEQ_REVIEW_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, SEQ_R_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, #{P_ID}, #{REVIEW_TITLE}, #{REVIEW_GOOD}, #{REVIEW_BAD}, TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{USER_NICKNAME} #{REVIEW_SERVICE}, #{REVIEW_FACILITY}, #{REVIEW_CLEAN}, #{REVIEW_COST}, #{REVIEW_LOCATION} )
